title: Feathery Ridges
description: These ridges are often referred to as transverse aeolian ridges, or TAR, and they take a variety of forms. Here they sit at right angles to the direction of the valley, because the topography funnels the wind along the trough.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
